title: Two mountain lands: Andes and Alps
creator_credit: Andrew B. Nemes, Learning Corporation of America and Audio Visual Productions
brief_description: Contrasts the life of a Swiss Alpine dairy farmer with that of a terrace farmer from the Peruvian Andes. Shows differences in farming methods, transportation systems, traditions and economic structures. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Andrew B. Nemes, Learning Corporation of America and Audio Visual Productions
